Nerangs.ab: skūrag kē-š zōhr padiš abar ǰām gāh ud barsom nihādan ahurəm mazdąm aṣ̌auuanəm aṣ̌ahe ratūm yazamaide pad mayānag ī barsom nihādan abar war ī zōhrag az sar ī barsom pad čahār angust aməṣ̌ā. spəṇtā huxšaϑrā huδā̊ŋhō yazamaide. pad hōy ī barsom nihišn frāztom sar ī barsom apō at̰ yazamaide. abar āb nihišn abar hōytar ī barsom pad war ī zōhrag az sar ī barsom pad čahār angust aṣ̌āunąm urunascā frauuaṣ̌īšcā yazamaide. abar ē barēd ō dašntar ī barsom pad war ī zōhrag ham ēdōn pad čahār angust

"He should put the cup that contains the zōhr next to the place of the ǰīw and next to the barsom. At ahurәm mazdąm aѕauuanәm aѕahe ratūm yazamaide, he should put it in the middle of the barsom, next to the zōhrag, four finger away from the end of the barsom. At aməṣ̌ā spəṇtā huxšaϑrā huδā̊ŋhō yazamaide, he should put it at the left side of the barsom, at the front of the barsom. At apō at̰ yazamaide, he has to put it over the water, at the left side of the barsom, next to the zōhrag, four finger away from the end of the barsom. At aṣ̌āunąm urunascā frauuaṣ̌īšcā yazamaide, he should bring it to the right side of the barsom, next to the zōhrag, again thus, four finger (away from the end of the barsom)."

ahurəm mazdąm. pad mayānag ī barsom abar ē barēd aṣ̌auuanəm aṣ̌ahe ratūm yazamaide. abar war ī zōhrag az sar ī barsom pad čahār angust aməṣ̌ā spəṇtā huxšaϑrā huδā̊ŋhō yazamaide. frāztom sar ī barsom apō at̰ yazamaide. abar hōytar ī barsom pad war ī zōhrag az sar ī barsom pad čahār angust aṣ̌āunąm urunascā. ō dašntar ī barsom pad war ī zōhrag az sar ī barsom pad čahār angust frauuaṣ̌īšcā yazamaide.

"At ahurəm mazdąm, he should bring it to the middle of the barsom. At aṣ̌auuanəm aṣ̌ahe ratūm yazamaide, next to the zōhrag, four fingers away from the end of the barsom. At aməṣ̌ā spəṇtā huxšaϑrā huδā̊ŋhō yazamaide, to the front of the barsom. At apō at̰ yazamaide, to the left side of the barsom, at the level of the barsom, four fingers away from the end of the barsom. At aṣ̌āunąm urunascā, to the right side of the barsom, at the level of the barsom, four fingers away from the end of the barsom (and continue with) frauuaṣ̌īšcā yazamaide."

ab.em: ẏat̰ zaōta ahurəm mazdąm ẏazāiti †maδəmāi barəsmąn paiti.barōit̰ aməṣ̌ə̄ spəṇtə̄ yazāiti †fratəmāi barəsmąn paiti.barōit̰ apō at̰ ẏazamaide †hauuiiōtəmāi barəsmąn paiti.barōit̰ aṣ̌āunąm urunasca †frauuaṣ̌īšca ẏazamaide †dašinōtəmāi barəsmąn paiti.barōit̰ vīspaēibiiō ẏasnō.kərətaēibiiō maδəmāi †barəsmąn paiti.barōit̰

Quotations.ab: "When the zaōtar says ahurəm mazdąm yazamaide, he should bring (the libation) to the middle of the barəsman. When he says aməṣ̌ə̄ spəṇtə̄ yazamaide, he should bring (the libation) to the front of the barəsman. (When he says), apō at̰ ẏazamaide, he should bring (the libation) to the left side of the barəsman. (When he says) aṣ̌āunąm urunasca frauuaṣ̌īšca ẏazamaide, he should bring (the libation) to the right side of the barəsman. At each yeŋ́hē.hātā, he should bring (the libation) to the middle of the barəsman."

ka zōt ohrmazd yazēd [kū ēn abestāg gōwēd ay kū ahurəm mazdąm] pad mayānag ī barsom abar ē barēd ka amahraspandān yazēd [pad ān ī meh ud weh nām] frāztom pad barsom abar ē barēd [pad sar ī barsom] ka āb ēdōn yazēd ō hōytom ī barsom abar ē barēd [pad war ī zōhrag] ka ahlawān ruwān frawahr yazād ō dašntom pad barsom abar ē barēd [pad hassārīh ī zōhrag] ud pad harwispīn yazišn-kardārīh [pad ẏeŋ́he hātąm] pad mayānag ī barsom abar ē barēd [pad war ī zōhrag]

"When the zōt worships Ohrmazd [that is, he says following Avestan text: ahurəm mazdąm], he should bring (the libation) to the middle of the barsom. When he worships the Amahraspandān, [with their big and best names], he should bring (the libation) to the front of the barsom [to the end of the barsom]. When he worships thus the waters, he should bring (the libation) to the left side of the barsom [at the level of the zōhrag]. When he worships the souls and frawahr of the orderly ones, he should bring (the libation) to the right side of the barsom [at the level of the zōhrag]. At each yazišn-making [at the Yeŋ́hē.hātā], he should bring (the libation) to the middle of the barsom [at the level of the zōhrag]."
Cf. N52.4(Avestan)(cf. Kotwal and Kreyenbroek, 2003: p. ****)

ab.em: ẏat̰ zaōta ahurəm mazdąm ẏazāiti *maδəmāi barəsmąn paiti.barōit̰ aməṣ̌ə̄ spəṇtə̄ yazāiti *fratəmāi barəsmąn paiti.barōit̰ apō at̰ ẏazamaide *hauuiiōtəmāi barəsmąn paiti.barōit̰ aṣ̌āunąm urunasca *frauuaṣ̌īšca ẏazamaide *dašinōtəmāi barəsmąn paiti.barōit̰.

Quotations.ab: When the zaōtar makes the yasna for Ahura Mazdā, he should bring (the offering) on the middle part of the barəsman. When he makes the yasna for the Aməṣ̌a Spəṇta, he should bring ()the offering) to the middle part of the barəsman. (At) apō at̰ ẏazamaidehe should bring (the offering) on the fartest part to the left of the barəsman. At aṣ̌āunąm urunasca *frauuaṣ̌īšca ẏazamaidehe should bring(the offering) to the fartest part to the right of the barəsman.
The Avestan version describes the procedure as it appears in the Yasna, and the Middle Persian as in the Visperad (Cantera, 2014: pp. 191 ff.)
